111.content: Before we get into any other details, how is your attitude towards monsters?
111.title: A woman amongst monsters.

choices: Your folks have dragged you here.
You're here to tear the place down!
1113.content: So, if you hate monsters, why are you at the hotel?
1113.title: Racist!

112.content:
Tom was an average 18 year old boy taking a little trip. Hotel Transylvania had recently opened its doors for humans, so Tom was driving to check out the cool hotel of creeps, ghouls, and monsters alike! He was coming up to the hotel and started adjusting his shirt. He was wearing a yellow t-shirt with black shorts and orange slip-ons. Tom arrived at the hotel and was astonished by the sight of the monster hotel. Parking his convertible, the 198 lbs. teen exited his vehicle and stood at 6' 2".
Tom retrieved his luggage from the trunk and made his way towards the glass entrance. He opened the door and stepped into the fancy interior of the entrance way. The lobby was even fancier than he'd ever imagined. Upon giving his luggage to a bellhop and checking in, Tom made his way to the elevator. Along the way, he took in the awesome view of all the monsters in the lobby. Soon, he was in the elevator and the zombie pushed his floor number. The elevator stopped after going up 2 floors and opened its doors. Tom exited and traveled down the halls of the third floor to his room, 318, and used the shiny key to unlock his room.
The room was decorated with gothic style furniture and carpets. The phone was a gargoyle head, and the light gave the room a grim feeling to it. Tom found it nostalgic, since he was always intrigued by monsters as a little boy. He set his suitcases down on the couch and decided to explore the hotel. He exited his room and proceeded to walk down the hall, when he ran into...
112.title: Boy

choices: One of the Draculas (give options, please).
1122.content: Who did Tom run into?
1122.title: Tom's surprise guest.

This must be Count dracula she thought so she said hello there count the count looked way way way up at her and said you must be miss amber.amber said yes i am.the count said i have a favour to ask you amber said anything drac said can you be friends with my daughter mavis she needs more friends amber said yes i will and so she went to mavis room she went over and saw mavis amber went over and said hello mavis. 12533.content: More options (since the others suck...)
12533.title: More

12533111.content:
You are Winnie, the only girl werewolf pup. You wear a collar, a pink baby shirt with a skull and crossbones, and you suck on a pink pacifier with a skull and crossbones on it. The pacifier only leaves the safety of your mouth when you absolutely have to. You are sitting next to your mother, while your 300 brothers wrestle in the back. Your entire family is going to the hotel for Dennis's sixth birthday. You love Dennis. And you think he might even love you back. The whole way there, all you can think about is hanging out with your zing. (Dennis) then, you come back to reality when one of your brothers takes your precious pacifier out of your mouth. You became furious.

What do you do?
12533111.title: Girl

choices: Walk past Dennis, and simply say hi.
125331112.content:
You were absolutely furious! You jump up, and dive dee into the puppy pile. One by one, you latch all of your brother's collars together. None of them can get away now. You furiously stomp up to your brother. He gets very worried as he comes into your view. You look extremely surprised when you see that he has your pacifier in his mouth. That made you go crazy mad! You bite his arm as hard as your little puppy self could.
He screamed in pain. But as soon as your pacifier left his mouth, you snatched it right out of the air. As soon as it was clutched in your paw you popped it back into your mouth. On ce you had your pacifier back in your mouth, you scratched your brother across the face. There was a huge gash. Once you were done punishing your brother, you crawled back into the middle of the pile and unmatched one single collar latch, all of them fell to the ground. You then crawled back into the arms of your mother. Wally, the bad brother that took your pacifier, sat on the other side of mother, licking his wounds. After an hour went by, you arrived at the hotel. Dennis, Mavis,Dracula, and Johnny were there waiting.


What happens next?
125331112.title: Destroy all who oppose you

choices: Dennis made half of his room pink so you could stay in his room.
Dennis got bunk beds so you cold sleep in his room with him.
1253311121.content:
Seeing Dennis made you so exited that you jump up, and leap for the door. Your brothers all stop when you get infront of them. You pull your pacifier out of your mouth, put your paw through the ring that hangs from the pacifier, and slide the pacifier up your arm. You leap at Dennis , and you tackle him, and begin furiously licking him. Dennis laughs uncontrollably. You stop licking him, and start to talk to him. You haven't seen him for five months. You are extremely exited to see your zing! You get off of Dennis and you both stand up. You take your pacifier off your arm, and put it back into your mouth. Dennis takes your paw and you both race to his room. Dennis said he had some cool new stuff in his room! And you want to see it!
When you and Dennis get to his room, he stops outside the door. "Close your eyes Winnie!" Dennis says.
You excitedly put your paws over your eyes and wait. "Are you ready Winnie?" Asks Dennis.
You shake your head up and down rapidly. You hear the door open. "Look!" Dennis says. You take your paws off your eyes , and see the best thing ever!

What is in the room?
1253311121.title: Tackle, and lick Dennis

choices: Mingle with other monsters by the pool
12533111211.content:
You took your paws off your eyes, and your jaw dropped. Your pacifier fell from your mouth. Dennis saw and cleaned it off before putting it back in your mouth. "Since you are alwase n your mommy and daddy's room with all your brothers, I thought you could live with me!" Dennis says as he leads you to your side of the room. It has everything! You love your side of the room! You pull Dennis back and hug him tight. You take your pacifier for your mouth, "thank you Dennis! Your the best friend ever!" You say to him. Mavis and your mother walk into the room. "Winnie, I talked to your mother, and she said it's perfectly fine for you to live here with us." Says Mavis. You jump into a great big hug with Mavis. "Thank you Mavis." You whisper in her ear as you hug. "Your welcome, Winnie." Says Mavis. "Let's go say hi to family, Winnie." Dennis says as he takes your paw in his hand. "Ok." You tell him before putting your pacifier back in your mouth.



What happens next?
12533111211.title: Dennis made half of his room pink so you could ...

choices: Go explore the rest of the hotel
Take a nap in your new room
125331112111.content:
You walk into the lobby, Dennis's cousins see you and run away. "You just scare them a little. From last year. They just don't know you that well yet. But they will." Dennis tells you as he gently rubs the back of your paw. You smile and hug Dennis. "If your cousins don't want to be near Winnie, you should leave her by her self." Wally says to Dennis. You raise up your paw and strike down really hard, scathing Wally's face on the other side. Wally whimpers in pain and runs away again




What next?
125331112111.title: You find Dennis's cousins
